featured.text: Two years later, it was awarded first prize again at Houston’s first annual Invention Fair.

definition.zh_def: 休士頓：美國德克薩斯州的一個城市，以其石油工業和航天中心而聞名。
definition.en_def: Houston: A city in Texas, USA, known for its oil industry and space exploration center.
definition.example: Houston is the fourth largest city in the United States.
